mapper.update: update vedioauth set state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditTime = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, applyTime = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auditor_id = #{auditor_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, applier_id = #{applier_id,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, state, remark, auditTime, applyTime, auditor_id, applier_id from vedioauth
